text: qabardaar! Allah taâ€™ala hee ke liye qaalis ibaadath karna hai aur jin logo ne us ke siva auliya bana rakhe hai (aur kehte hai) ke hum un ki ibaadath sirf isi liye karte hai ke ye (buzrug) Allah ke nazdiki ke martabe tak hamaari rasaayi kara de, ye log jis baare mein eqtelaaf kar rahe hai, us ka (saccha) faisla Allah khud karega, jhute aur na shukre (logo) ko Allah raah nahi dikhaata
